CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Delivered to Retail stage positioned above or below the Packaged for Distribution stage?
SRP.A: The Delivered to Retail stage is positioned {below} the Packaged for Distribution stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {29013}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to Retail?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to Retail is {6020}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Filtered by Quality Inspection, with a value of {29013}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Purchased by Consumers, with a value of {5150}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail?
SC.A: Decreased by {8486} Tons from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {14507} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Delivered to Retail to stage Purchased by Consumers?
SC.A: Decreased by {870} Tons from stage Delivered to Retail to stage Purchased by Consumers.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 21759? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {29013}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 10263? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Delivered to Retail} stage has {6020}, the {Purchased by Consumers} stage has {5150}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 5585 and 10263? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to {Packaged for Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Packaged for Distribution} to {Delivered to Retail} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers, from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to stage {Packaged for Distribution} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} and {Packaged for Distribution} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Delivered to Retail} and {Purchased by Consumers} stages.
